text: was a Japanese politician. He served as Minister of Internal Affairs and Communications under Prime Minister Tarō Asō until 12 June 2009. Hatoyama died on 20 June 2016 in a hospital in Tokyo, at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Ministers of justice of Japan Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Internal Affairs and Communications ministers of Japan
